data.title: Aircraft Engine Manufacturers & Suppliers
meta_keywords: top 10 aircraft engine manufacturers in the world
data.meta_description: Discover a range of high-quality aircraft engines from leading manufacturers at Air Power Inc. As trusted aircraft part suppliers, we offer the best in aviation engineering. Explore our selection today.
data.text:
Shop From Over 90 Top Aircraft Engine & Parts Manufacturers

Welcome to Air Power Inc., your number-one destination for top-tier general aviation aircraft engines and parts. As a leading supplier of aircraft parts and engines, we take immense pride in our curated (and comprehensive) network of 90+ esteemed aircraft engine manufacturers and aircraft parts suppliers. Our mission is simple. We offer general aviation pilots an affordable and reliable source for all OEM aircraft parts needs.

We understand the importance of quality, safety and efficiency in aviation. That's why we leave no stone unturned when selecting our partners. Each of our collaborating aircraft parts and engine manufacturers are names you know and trust to power your flights. From OEM aircraft engine parts to in-stock, ready-to-ship aircraft engines for sale from the best names in the industry, we strive to provide our customers with exceptional products and unparalleled customer service. Browse our complete list of aircraft engine manufacturers and part suppliers to find what you need today.

We Only Provide the Best Parts From the Best Partners

Navigating the vast world of aviation parts and engines can be challenging, but we're here to streamline the process. Our extensive network of aircraft part suppliers and aircraft engine manufacturers encompasses a wide range of specialties, ensuring you have access to the finest selection of airplane engines, components and accessories to suit your needs.

We're even the largest global supplier of Lycoming aircraft engines and the preferred provider of Continental® aircraft engines. At Air Power Inc., you can take flight with the peace of mind that comes from knowing you're equipped with the best in the business.

Find Any Part You Need for Your Aircraft

Our network of trusted aircraft parts manufacturers enables us to offer an extensive inventory of top-tier airplane engines, components and parts. From power plants and propellers to landing gear, avionics and much more, we have everything you need to keep your aircraft in peak condition. Whatever the make or model of your aircraft, we strive to be your one-stop shop for all your aviation requirements. By collaborating with various aircraft parts manufacturers, we can negotiate competitive pricing and pass those cost savings on to you. Enjoy peace of mind knowing that you are getting the best value for your investment without compromising quality.

From industry giants to niche innovators, our trusted aircraft part suppliers and engine manufacturers collectively contribute to our vision of empowering every pilot with the tools they need to soar with confidence.

Quality & Safety Are Our No. 1 Priority

We understand that safety is the foremost concern for any pilot. That's why we prioritize quality and reliability in everything we offer. As a trusted aircraft parts supplier, we only work with aircraft engine and parts manufacturers known for producing products that meet and exceed industry standards. Rest assured that every item you purchase from Air Power Inc. is rigorously tested and vetted for top-notch performance and reliability.

If you'd like to learn more about any of our partnering aircraft parts manufacturers, feel free to reach out anytime to talk to a team member. With 100+ years of combined experience in the industry, we know a thing or two about choosing the best parts for your aircraft make and model. We're behind you every step of the way.

Frequently Asked Questions: Aircraft Engine Manufacturers & Parts Suppliers

If you have any questions or need more information about the best small aircraft engines on the market, check out the answers to our most frequently asked questions below.

Who Are the Top 10 Aircraft Engine Manufacturers In the World?

As of 2021, the top 10 aircraft engine manufacturers worldwide are:

General Electric Aviation (GE Aviation) - USA

Rolls-Royce - UK

Pratt & Whitney (a division of Raytheon Technologies) - USA

Safran Aircraft Engines - France

CFM International (a joint venture between GE Aviation and Safran Aircraft Engines) - USA/France

Honeywell Aerospace - USA

MTU Aero Engines - Germany

Engine Alliance (a joint venture between GE Aviation and Pratt & Whitney) - USA

IAE International Aero Engines AG (a consortium of Pratt & Whitney, Japanese Aero Engines Corporation, and MTU Aero Engines) - USA/Germany/Japan

United Engine Corporation (UEC) - Russia

Who Are the Best Aircraft Engine Manufacturers In the USA?

Based on revenue, market share and overall quality, the best aircraft engine manufacturers in the USA are:

General Electric Aviation (GE Aviation)

Pratt & Whitney (a division of Raytheon Technologies)

Rolls-Royce LibertyWorks

Honeywell Aerospace

Lycoming Engines

Continental® Motors

Textron Lycoming

Which Small Aircraft Engine Manufacturers Partner With Air Power Inc.?

Our two main small aircraft engine manufacturers available at Air Power Inc. are Lycoming Engines and Continental®. However, we partner with companies like Pratt & Whitney, Textron Aviation, General Electric and more for specialized OEM aircraft engine parts.

Choose Air Power Inc. for Products You Can Trust From Top Aircraft Part & Engines Manufacturers

When you choose Air Power Inc., you're not just selecting a distributor; you're choosing a partner dedicated to empowering your aviation journey. Our network of trusted aircraft engine manufacturers and parts suppliers, coupled with our commitment to quality, affordability and customer satisfaction, ensures you can fly confidently, knowing you have the best support behind you. Experience the benefits of our extensive inventory, competitive pricing, and specialized solutions as we strive to make your aviation dreams take flight. Let Air Power Inc. be your ultimate destination for all your piston-powered airplane engines and parts needs.

Contact Us
